description: Main frontend entry point and widget configuration for the personal notes organizer app, including app initialization, routing, theming, and a sample UI for notes list.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget that sets up providers, theme, and navigation routes.

classes.name: NotesListScreen
classes.description: Main screen displaying list of notes and a floating action button to add notes.

classes.name: _PlaceholderScreen
classes.description: A temporary placeholder screen for unimplemented routes.

classes.name: NotesDb
classes.description: Stub for database initialization, to be replaced with a real database implementation.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point, initializes necessary services and runs the app.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method of MyApp widget, constructs the widget tree with providers and routing.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method of NotesListScreen, constructs the main notes list interface.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method of _PlaceholderScreen, shows a simple 'Coming soon...' message.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method of _NotFoundScreen, indicates that the route was not found.
